title: S1 EP12: Alexander Wang’s Chief Strategist feat. Stephanie Horton
itunes:title: Alexander Wang’s Chief Strategist feat. Stephanie Horton
description: Previously at FarFetch & Shopbop, Stephanie Horton explains the fundamentals that go into a fashion business, why there are no shortcuts when it comes to e-commerce and the things she looks for in an employee.
content:encoded: Previously at FarFetch & Shopbop, Stephanie Horton explains the fundamentals that go into a fashion business, why there are no shortcuts when it comes to e-commerce and the things she looks for in an employee.
